body.name: Portable Washer and Dryer Combo XPB36-1288SA Mini Washing Machine, Black
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 16 hrs 12 mins
features: Large Capacity Twin tub Washer: Portable mini washer has two separate tubs, washing tub and spin tub, allowing you to wash and dry clothes at the same time. The compact and lightweight design makes it easy to fit in bathrooms or closets. Perfect for dorms, apartments, RVs, etc.

Powerful Performance: Equipped with a powerful motor, clothes can be washed quickly and efficiently. Washer: 8lbs, Spin Cycle: 6.6lbs. Our mini washer machine can achieve low consumption and save water, while free your hands.

Separate Time Control & Lint Filter: Users can control washing time, washing mode and spinning time through the three control switches on the panel. There is water inlets on the panel for connecting the hose to easily add water. With the simple control panel, this mini washer is easy to operate and you can get clean clothes in three steps.

User-friendly Design: Thanks to the high quality PP body, this washing machine is lightweight, does not deform and rust easily, and has a long service life. The washer produces the powerful water flow that effectively cleans clothes and reduces wear. It is equipped with a drain hose to easily drain out dirty water.
body.description: Do Not Hesitate to Choose This Washing Machine! A washing machine is common in each household. Today we are pleased to recommend this Semi-automatic Twin Tube Washing Machine to you.This semi-automatic twin tube washing machine is an indispensable machine for your daily life. It can help you to wash dirty clothes quickly. With the first-grade stainless steel & plastic & PP material, it doesn't break your clothes during laundry. And it can keep your clothes as new! It is a very useful gadget for each household. Come to get one back home! Warm Notice: 1.Built-in Gravity Drain: draining hose needs to be put lower than washer body when draining 2. Before shipping the machine to our warehouse, we do have QC testing on it for ensuring that the washing machine is working fine, so sometimes, it would be a very little remaining water in it, and we also add a desiccant in it for moisture absorption, but it is in new condition. Energy Saving Water & Power Saving = Money Saving Complicated life becomes easier because of this washing machine Dimensions: 24'' x 14'' x 27" Weight: 12kg / 26lbs Capacity:12.4lbs(washer 8lbs,spinner 4.4lbs) Rated Wash Input Power: 240W Rated Spin Input Power: 120W Portable Washing Machine with Spin Dryer Ideal For Limited Spaces If your room is not so spacious and you would like to have a washing machine, there is no problem on that. This compact mini twin tub washing machine is perfect for those with a need to multi-task, save space and may want to save themselves a trip to the expensive laundromat. Manufactured from a durable plastic body, this compact washing machine is ideal for camping trips, dorms, campus life, apartments or anywhere with limited space. 1 x Twin Tube Washing Machine Use occasionally for cloth baby diapers, delicate undergarments, silks and other fine fabrics, or use all the time to avoid trips to laundromat. washer Suitable for Washing All Kinds of Clothes Our mini compact washing machine is perfect for underwear,socks,T-Shirt and Towels. It will make your life more convenient. Easy Operation Simple design of the operation panel, wash timer, wash selector, and spin timer, more easier to use. Allows you to simply put in your load of clothes, fill with water, set the timer and start washing, completely suitable for everywhere 360 Rotation 360 rotation produces tumbling water, 360 cleanse , and 2 directions of rotations reduce the clothes wrapped together. Powerful Motor Washing and spinning are all work by1300RPM quality motor, with a max frequency of 60Hz. Powerful, fast, and work longer, what's more, it will make your clothes more cleaner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed a washer in my studio and I found Tiktun portable and I have to say I am really pleased with it. It washes very well, and spins crazy well! So what else can you ask? congrats to the builders!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as Landry Matt's are getting expensive and in 24 hours I done a ton of Landry and all of it came out smelling great and clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke as soon as I got it
reviews.reviewText: I just bought this unboxed it and it started to work I was so excited then when to drain the water it would not drain. Then the dryer does not work at all I’m highly disappointed I was in anticipation to get it and I didn’t I was so upset

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for washing children's clothes but things that get heavy..like jeans or a sweater should not be washed in these.The machine isn't really loud but it could be quiter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love this. Works great. Save me trips to the laundry Matt. Easy to use and move when needed to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I got it I tried to use it but couldn’t get the washer or spinner to work after a half hour of trying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It worked for 10 mins and then the spinner stopped working, had to call to get a replacement.
